import './sidebar.css' import cat from '../header/cat.jpg' import { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' export default function Sidebar() { const [cat, setCats] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { const getCats = async () => { const res = await axios.get('/catogories') setCats(res.data) } getCats() }, []) return (

) }
